Occasion error

An error occurred while saving the occasion
Select "This is a gift" to:
  • Deliver the device unregistered. The recipient can register the device to their own Amazon account when it arrives.
  • Include a packing slip so the recipient knows who it's from.
  • Hide prices on the packing slip.
  • Add optional gift wrap.
  • Include a personalized gift message.
  • Keep the gift a surprise by concealing items that ship in only the manufacturer's original box.

View your Wish Lists

Your Wish Lists will always be at the top, followed by the lists of people you "remember".
6 / 6 Back End tour

Sort and filter

Sort your items alphabetically, by price, by date added, or by priority. Filter your items by category, price drops, or by purchase status.
4 / 6 Back Next
List tour: Take a moment to see what's new.

Find other people's lists

You'll be surprised how many people you know have Amazon Wish Lists. First search and find someone, then click "Remember" to keep track of their lists and make gift giving a snap.
1 / 6 Cancel Next

Share your list

Make it easy for others to view and purchase the items you want by emailing your Wish List to them.
3 / 6 Back Next

Sort and filter

Once you add items to your list, you will have the option to sort and filter. Sort your items alphabetically, by price, by date added, or by priority. Filter your items by category, price drops, or by purchase status.
4 / 6 Back Next

Add items to your list

Start adding items to your List. You can then add quantity and priority, or include personal notes. Here's an example:
I just love this, it's my favorite.
Priority: High | Want: 2
2 / 6 Back Next

Add comments, quantity, and priority

Get the gifts you really want by adding quantity and priority, or make personal notes. Here's an example:
I just love this, it's my favorite.
Priority: High | Want: 2
2 / 6 Back Next

Edit name, print, and update list profile

List Actions is where you can edit the name of your list, print the list, or change your delivery address (under "Update List Profile").
5 / 6 Back Next

List tour

View the tour whenever you want.

Your friends and family

When you make a gift purchase for another person, we will automatically remember them for you so you can have easy access to the people you gift.

You can remove people by clicking on their name and then Delete this person. If you would like to turn off this feature, go to your List profile settings and deselect 'Automatically remember the people I gift when I checkout on Amazon'.
